info.name: Cities
info.attribution:
Room layout by ArnoldSmith86 and LawDawg96 released to public domain by CC0. Game pieces by ArnoldSmith86 released to public domain by CC0. The sprite sheet for the tiles was created by ArnoldSmith86 and LawDawg96, licensed as CC By 3.0, and contains the following artwork: CC By 3.0 by Delapouite: - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/rolled-cloth.html - https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/wheat.html - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/barrel.html - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/house.html - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/stone-bridge.html - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/church.html - https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/smoking-volcano.html (as modified by LawDawg96) CC By 3.0 by Lorc: - https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/dragon-head.html - https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/magic-portal.html CC By 3.0 by Skoll: - https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/chess-rook.html Available under the Flaticon License by Photo3idea_studio: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/church_4446088?term=church&page=1&position=2&page=1&position=2&related_id=4446088&origin=style#

info.description: Tile-building game where players create and link farmland, cities, and roads to earn points. Optional 4 expansion packs with additional tiles, scoring system, and rules available and built-in to the main game.
